narrative.title: 7Th Armoured Division - 1941Q3
narrative.situation: Formed as Mobile Division (Egypt) 1938, redesignated 7th Armoured Division 1939-10-01
narrative.objectives: Premier British armoured division ('Desert Rats') with extensive desert warfare experience. Specialized in mobile armoured operations, reconnaissance in depth, and combined arms coordination.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: coastal plain and rocky desert (Western Desert, Egypt)

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Combined arms coordination (armor, artillery, motorized infantry)

environment.terrain_type: coastal plain and rocky desert (Western Desert, Egypt)
